overview.heading: Albany Virtual Office
overview.body: Want an esteemed Albany address but not interested in the trappings of a standard office? Opus VO is your solution. Position your company within Albany’s robust business ecosystem, all while keeping your budget streamlined. For those critical meetings or collaborative team sessions, our modern conference rooms are at your service.  By picking our virtual workspace in Albany, you’re getting more than just a significant address. You also benefit from a dedicated live receptionist who will flawlessly integrate into your team. They’ll make sure every interaction with your clients is perfectly aligned with your brand, allowing us to tackle your everyday admin duties while you zero in on your key business objectives.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Albany, New York even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Albany. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within New York.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Albany virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Albany?
sections.body: Albany isn’t just a historical landmark; it’s a bustling hub for business across a range of sectors like tech, government, and healthcare. Having an Albany address not only raises your company’s profile but also grants you access to important networking opportunities and industry connections.  Choosing Opus VO for your virtual workspace in Albany isn’t just about making life simpler; it’s a calculated advantage. Ready to elevate your business persona? Delve into our range of specialized virtual workspace options today.  Opus VO, Albany @ 251 New Karner Road, Albany, NY 12205
